tweet: Ripple is flying around the world talking to central banks and governments.  Charlie Lee is in his basement printing Hodl shirts to fund Litecoin.  Who would you take serious?

Some say  Libra is going to kill #XRP...  Bitcoin is going to make banks disappear & replace the fiat currencies of the world...  Litecoin is the right coin...  As @digitalassetbuy said today, “the XRP Community is so large because most people are smart!”
"Why is this dummy running with this binder?"  This is a question #USArmyReserve LTC Moss gets a lot. His answer might surprise you.  @ArmyTenMilerATM  https://t.co/13IrRY9FG1

From elevating an antiquated financing model, to getting the power of crypto in front of millions across the globe, there are many reasons why film is an industry that makes sense for #Litecoin.📽️  See how we're pushing deeper into it:  https://t.co/00ikLF0Qpq @SDFilmFestival  https://t.co/ve5vJU3x0I
I just had an idea like a Litecoin bulb. An XRP shirt with a similar design to the IMF logo.  Go to work talented folks.

Accumulating some small amounts of alt coins still.   #XRP(.271), #XLM(0.6), and #LTC ($56) recently.  These are long term holds for and I'm willing to DCA if we go lower.  Most traders/investors will perform better playing a long term game rather than a short term.
